name: Ministry of Solving Evil #GodotWildJam33
description:
Hello there!
You have been promoted to work as the new head of the Ministry of Solving Evil.
You have 20 days to get rid of all our problems (evil sighting and all bad creatures) or everything will cease to exist.
Your previous boss has disappeared last week and we can't find him anywhere.
There are recruits waiting for you, make them into parties of 1-3 and fight our enemies!
Don't worry too much about them, there will be more coming daily ;)

Hello this is my entry for the #GodotWildJam33
Unfortunately I didn't have time to make any music or add sound effects :(
You win by fighting quests to empty the red bar of evil energy or by defeating all 5 bosses (quests with crowns)

Symbol meanings:
- sword/bow/mace/book - attack/heal power
- heart - health points
- shoe - speed - bigger number attacks first
- shield - defense against (enemy takes 1/2 dmg)
- coin - gold/money
- devil - how much `evil` points you get for defeating the task
- skull - deaths or kills
* if a quest/mob has a crown it means its a boss fight

Enjoy!
Tools used:
- Godot Engine 3.3
- Pixelorama
- Krita
- font - https://saint11.org/blog/fonts/
